Translations.Text: Surely those believe those est Judaicus Christians converts anyone qui (1) believes in DEUS (2) believes in Extremum Feria (3) leads righteous vita receive their recompense their Dominus! They habet nihil fear nor testimentum they grieve
Nos factus covenant vos prout nos levabat Mount Sinai vos Vos uphold quod nos dedit vos strongly remember its contents ut vos saved
Vos turned deinde ac it est pro deus gratia vos His mercy vos doomed
Vos known de those among vos desecrated Sabbath. Nos dictus to them Est vos prout despicable prout apes
Nos set them example their generation alias prout subsequentis generations enlightenment pro the righteous
Moses dictus to his people DEUS commands vos sacrifice heifer. They dictus Est vos mocking nos? He dictus "DEUS forbid ego behave like ignorant unus
They dictus Alias tuus Dominus show nos quae unus. He dictus He dictus she est heifer est nec too veteris nor too junior; de intermediate saeculum! Nunc carry quod vos commanded perfecit
They dictus Alias tuus Dominus show nos eam color He dictus He dictus she est yellow heifer bright colored pleases beholders
